Name: Legends of the Universe - Cosmic Bounty
About the game: Cosmic Bounty is a metroidvania style action platformer. You play as Jekt, A Bounty Hunter commissioned with hunting down a rebel General named Volgat. Explore areas to gain new abilities and increase your stats so you can defeat powerful enemies. Jekt has different abilities than the previous game's hero Trion. Jekt's new abilities include The Beam, Gliding, Rapid Shot among others. A More In-depth Map A New Framework So the Game Runs smoother. New Characters and A New story. More User Optimization.
